actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 94-960.

official_title: Resolution to provide funds for the expenses of investigations, studies, oversight, and functions of the Committee on Government Operations.

summary.text: Authorizes the appropriation of $1,589,000 to carry out general oversight and investigation responsibilities by the House Committee on Government Operations. Allocates $16,000 of such amount provided by this resolution to procure the services of consultants.

titles.title: Resolution to provide funds for the expenses of investigations, studies, oversight, and functions of the Committee on Government Operations.
